cards.name: Captain America
cards.description: Captain America is a super-soldier known for his unwavering sense of justice, leadership, and dedication to protecting freedom. Armed with his iconic shield, he fights to defend the world from evil forces.

cards.name: Iron Man
cards.description: Iron Man is a genius billionaire playboy philanthropist who fights crime in his advanced, weaponized suit of armor. He uses technology to protect the world.

cards.name: Thor
cards.description: Thor, the god of thunder, wields his mighty hammer Mjolnir and fights to protect the realms. He is a powerful Asgardian warrior.

cards.name: Black Widow
cards.description: Black Widow is a highly skilled spy and combatant. She uses her intelligence and agility to protect the world from the shadows.

cards.name: Hawkeye
cards.description: Hawkeye is a master archer, using his precise marksmanship and agility to fight alongside the Avengers.

cards.name: Hulk
cards.description: Hulk possesses immense strength and near invulnerability, transforming into a powerful green giant when angered.

cards.name: Spider-Man
cards.description: Spider-Man uses his agility, spider-sense, and web-slinging abilities to fight crime and protect his city.

cards.name: Doctor Strange
cards.description: Doctor Strange is the Sorcerer Supreme, using magic and mystic arts to defend the Earth from supernatural threats.

cards.name: Black Panther
cards.description: Black Panther, the king of Wakanda, uses his enhanced abilities and vibranium suit to protect his kingdom and the world.

cards.name: Scarlet Witch
cards.description: Scarlet Witch has the ability to manipulate reality and use chaos magic to fight against powerful foes.

cards.name: Vision
cards.description: Vision is a synthezoid with the ability to phase through objects, fly, and wield immense energy.

cards.name: Ant-Man
cards.description: Ant-Man can shrink to the size of an ant or grow to enormous proportions, using his size-changing abilities to fight evil.

cards.name: Wasp
cards.description: Wasp uses her shrinking technology and combat skills to fight alongside Ant-Man, utilizing agility and intelligence.

cards.name: Star-Lord
cards.description: Star-Lord leads the Guardians of the Galaxy with his cunning, combat skills, and love for music.

cards.name: Gamora
cards.description: Gamora is a deadly assassin and member of the Guardians of the Galaxy, known for her exceptional combat abilities.

cards.name: Drax
cards.description: Drax is a warrior with immense strength and combat abilities, driven by a desire for revenge against evil forces.

cards.name: Rocket Raccoon
cards.description: Rocket is a genetically enhanced raccoon with expert marksmanship and technical skills, often using his wit and weapons in battle.

cards.name: Groot
cards.description: Groot is a sentient tree-like creature with regenerative abilities and a powerful physical presence in combat.

cards.name: Captain Marvel
cards.description: Captain Marvel possesses cosmic powers, incredible strength, and the ability to fly, making her one of the most powerful heroes.

cards.name: Falcon
cards.description: Falcon uses advanced winged technology to fly and fight, serving as a skilled combatant and leader.
